actions.text: On agreeing to the Lujan, Ben Ray (NM) amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 207 (Roll no. 427).
Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan, Ben Ray (NM) amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 207 (Roll no. 427).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment to decrease and increase State and Tribal Assistance Grants by $6 million to direct the EPA to work with the affected States and Indian tribes to implement a long-term monitoring program for water quality of the Animas and San Juan Rivers in response to the Gold King Mine spill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 114-683 to decrease and increase State and Tribal Assistance Grants by $6 million to direct the EPA to work with the affected States and Indian tribes to implement a long-term monitoring program for water quality of the Animas and San Juan Rivers in response to the Gold King Mine spill.
